answers.answer: I'm 34 weeks I never had high blood pressure until this last visit after some testing I did end up having mild preeclampsia. Dont stress just talk to your doctor. They should test you.

I have hypertension had it b4 I was pregnant I'm 28 weeks but it is being controlled by meds so far no protein in urine and BP stays within range. Baby boy is also doing fine and growing as he is supposed to.
My blood pressure was high for the last 9 weeks of pregnancy,  it never developed into preeclampsia. When I went into Labour my bp was 160/110 so was rushed into hospital.

I'm 37 weeks going on 38. My check up yesterday showed high blood pressure for the first time, because of this they have asked to induce me at 39 weeks. Although my husband and I have had a horrible last month including a home invasion with us in the house, it was possible that I am just stressed but her heart rate was up last check up also. I'm not sure if they will just monitor it for a little or feel it safest to go this route.

question: Any other mommies have high blood pressure during pregnancy? I'm 26 weeks and have had high blood pressure my last three visits. What are your experiences? Did it eventually lead into preeclampsia?
title: High Blood Pressure
